T02D2158:253b-1: n'a ga karma kro dha ma ra na n'a ma /
T02D2158:253b-3: klu khro bos gsad pa'i phrin las zhes bya ba /
T02D2158:253b-4: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2158:253b-5: de bsnyen bzlas pa'i rtags byung na //
T02D2158:253b-6: 'ga' zhig dbang du bsdu dgos pas //
T02D2158:253b-7: de dbang bya phyir man ngag rim //
T02D2158:253b-8: mgon la lus btud man ngag dran //
T02D2158:253b-9: dur khrod la sogs gnas dag tu //
T02D2158:253b-10: sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yi //
T02D2158:253b-11: nag po'i phyogs kyi zla ba la //
T02D2158:253b-12: bdun dang dgu dang lnga dus la //
T02D2158:253b-13: dkyil 'khor gru gsum khru gang tshad //
T02D2158:253b-14: mgo ni lho ru bstan par bya //
T02D2158:253b-15: sbrul dang sbal pa'i sha dang ni //
T02D2158:253b-16: ske tshe ju che khri dang til //
T02D2158:253b-17: thal ba sa dang lan tshva dang ;
T02D2158:253b-18: / bu ram 'bras phye rnams las ni //
T02D2158:253b-19: sor brgyad tshad kyi smad 'khyil ba //
T02D2158:253b-20: dgu dad bdun dang lnga dang gsum //
T02D2158:253b-21: klu yi rgyal po'i gzugs byas te //
T02D2158:253b-22: mthing nag h'um phat snying gar gzhug / gru gsum nang du mgo bo lhor //
T02D2158:254a-0: bstan te gan rkyal lta bur gzhag / de ltar rdzas rnams @254a * //
T02D2158:254a-2: lha yi rnal 'byor bdag ldan pas //
T02D2158:254a-3: lcags kyu lnga dang sa bon lnga //
T02D2158:254a-4: 'dod pa'i lta la dbul ba ste //
T02D2158:254a-5: sbrul dang sbal pa'i sha khrag sogs //
T02D2158:254a-6: bsgrub bya de nyid la ni sbyin //
T02D2158:254a-7: rta sha la sogs sna tshogs sha / nang gi bka' srung rnams la sbyin //
T02D2158:254a-8: 'bras chan la sogs gtor ma ni //
T02D2158:254a-9: phyi yi bstan srung rnams la sbyin //
T02D2158:254a-10: bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya //
T02D2158:254a-11: sa bon las ni sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D2158:254a-12: khro bo mtshon cha 'dzin pa yis //
T02D2158:254a-13: bsgrub bya'i cho ga dang bral nas //
T02D2158:254a-14: drangs te sa bon la ni bstim //
T02D2158:254a-15: snga ma'i sa bon nyid gyur pas //
T02D2158:254a-16: 'gugs par byed pa'i sa bon byung //
T02D2158:254a-17: dza:h'um bam ho:n'i l'am ba ra badzra p'a ni aam
T02D2158:254a-18: ku sha dza:a'a karsha ya che ge mo h'um dza:h'um
T02D2158:254a-19: phat / gsang sngags 'di ni brjod ba las //
T02D2158:254a-20: lcags kyu thogs pa'i lha mo ni //
T02D2158:254a-21: dpag tu med pa bkug par bsam //
T02D2158:254a-22: dza:h'um bam ho:n'i l'am ba ra badzra p'a ni che ge mo pra be sha ya phat /
T02D2158:254a-23: gzugs brnyan kha phye bstims la gzhag / sna tshogs nad kyis gzir ba dang //
T02D2158:254a-24: lus 'dar sems ni gdung bar bsam //
T02D2158:254a-25: sta re la sogs mtshon gyis gzir //
T02D2158:254a-26: rlung nag gis g-yengs grang bas khyab //
T02D2158:254a-27: gcan gzan sogs kyis lus zos bsam //
T02D2158:254a-28: dam tshig bsrung phyir gtor ma sbyin ;
T02D2158:254a-29: / de nas phur bu mtshon cha thogs //
T02D2158:254a-30: gsad thabs gsum gyis gsad par bya //
T02D2158:254a-31: gnas bdun du ni phung bus gdab //
T02D2158:254a-32: h'um nga ni phyag na rdo rje ste //
T02D2158:254a-33: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02D2158:254a-34: gdug pa 'dul phyir dbang bskur bas //
T02D2158:254a-35: stobs chen phyin las drag po yis //
T02D2158:254a-36: skad cig tsam yang mi gnas phyir //
T02D2158:254a-37: lus kyi gnad du gzir bar gyis //
T02D2158:254a-38: aom n'i l'am ba ra badzra p'a ni che ge mo k'i li k'i la ya h'um phat phat /
T02D2158:254a-39: gsang ba'i bdag por bka' srung phyir //
T02D2158:254a-40: gsang ba'i dam tshig bstan par bya //
T02D2158:254a-41: aom n'i l'am bar badzra p'a ni sa ma ye h'um phat /
T02D2158:254a-42: phyag na rdo rje'i dam tshig ste ;
T02D2158:254a-43: / phur pa'i lha dang che ge mo //
T02D2158:254a-45: ci bsgo thams cad mnyan par gyis //
T02D2158:254a-46: h'um nga ro stobs chen drag po'i sgra //
T02D2158:254a-47: gdug pa gang zhig 'da' mi byed //
T02D2158:254a-48: nga yi mthu stobs drag po'i sgra //
T02D2158:254a-49: mgo bo tshal pa brgya ru 'gems //
T02D2158:254b-0: nyon cig ltos 'gro @254b thams cad kun //
T02D2158:254b-1: mthu stobs drag po'i bka' ma 'da' //
T02D2158:254b-2: aom n'i l'am ba ra badzra p'a ni che ge mo ha ra ha ra /
T02D2158:254b-3: pra ha ra pra ha ra /
T02D2158:254b-6: h'um rdo rje chen po rab 'bar tho //
T02D2158:254b-7: bka' las 'da' byed che ge mo //
T02D2158:254b-8: rdo rje chen pos snying bsregs nas //
T02D2158:254b-9: lus sems phra rab rdul du rlog /
T02D2158:254b-10: rdo rje tho ba'i gtun khung du //
T02D2158:254b-11: rdo rje tho bas gtams byas nas //
T02D2158:254b-12: lha yang thal bar rlag byed 'gyur //
T02D2158:254b-13: lha yi che ge mo des gsod //
T02D2158:254b-14: aom n'i l'am ba ra badzra p'a ni che ge mo ha na ha na /
T02D2158:254b-15: ha sa ha sa dha ra dha ra /
T02D2158:254b-16: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02D2158:254b-17: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya /
T02D2158:254b-19: rim pas gtor ma 'di sbyin no//
T02D2158:254b-20: bdag med dngos pos btab cing dbul //
T02D2158:254b-21: nges par sod nas mnan pa bya //
T02D2158:254b-22: dkon mchog gsum la ldang ba'i dgra / man ngag rim pas gsad par bya //
T02D2158:254b-23: thos pa mang zhing shes rab can //
T02D2158:254b-24: bla ma la gus ser sna med //
T02D2158:254b-25: yin gyi gzhan du sbyin mi bya //
T02D2158:254b-26: bdag med pas ni gal te byin //
T02D2158:254b-28: sdang dang gdug pas zin pa'i thabs //
T02D2158:254b-29: zab mo'i man ngag cung zad smras //
T02D2158:254b-30: de yi bsod nams ci bsags pa //
T02D2158:254b-31: sdang dang gdug pa 'dul bar shog //
T02D2158:254b-32: / slob dpon dz'a pa ri ba'i zhal lnga nas
T02D2158:254b-33: mdzad pa'i khro bos gsad pa'i phrin las pandi ta
T02D2158:254b-34: de ba p'urna ma ti dang /
